mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.role_code FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT m.perm FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.perm IS NOT NULL AND m.perm != ''
